alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Campbell; Morgan; Rhea; Roane; Scott (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 2:11PM CDT until August 12 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Morgan County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Rhea County in east Tennessee... Western Anderson County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Campbell County in east Tennessee... Roane County in east Tennessee... Southern Scott County in east Tennessee... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 311 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Jamestown to 7 miles west of Wartburg to near Rockwood, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oak Ridge, Kingston, Rockwood, Wartburg, Fairview, Oliver Springs, Midtown, Harriman, Sunbright, and Oakdale. This includes Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 341 and 362. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Campbell; Morgan; Rhea; Roane; Scott
